alert.note: Alert for Baker; Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mitchell and northern Baker Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 653 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newton, Camilla, Baconton, Hawkinstown, Flint, Freeman, Hopeful, Red Store Crossroads, Mitchell Co A/P, Branchville, Greenough and Elmodel Wma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
